attributes.action: The Government & the Transport Secretary to freeze January19 increases.
attributes.additional_details:
Many passengers have had their journeys increased by at least 30 to 40 minutes and made the daily commute a complete nightmare, even without the other delays and cancellations 
We envisage some rail companies may have not had the same issues but the Government need to send a clear message that this cannot and will not continue
attributes.background: We call upon the Government & the Transport Secretary to force rail companies to freeze the Jan 2019 increases. Considering passenger have had to endure months & months of disruptions, strikes, the timetable schedule mess, further delays, cancellations including stations that have had services cut.
